owunge daru pawul parata ada watune shri lanka nidahas paksha samajikathwaya wenuweni.owun nothaka harawath ada watim ha pasu basim amathaka kara shri lanka nidahas pakshaya wani janathawata kruthawedi pakshayakata 60 wasarak pilibanda udam anima kala nohakiya.ira payana mohotheth ira basa yana mohotheth apa owunge udara jiwitha parithyagayan da, kapa kirim da athi mahath wu kruthawedi gunayen yuthuwa sihipath karannemu.warthamanaye dawantha wrukshayak se dasatha athu pathara wihida preruda abhimanayen nangi sitina shri lanka nidahas pakshaya pihituwime palamu piyawara esawenne 1951 juli 12 wanida es.dab.aar.di.bandaranayaka shrimathanan eksath jathika paksha rajaye saukhya ha palath palana amathya padawiya ha sabhanayaka padawiya haradama wipakshayata piya nangu mohotheya.shri lankeya deshapalana gaman mange harawum lakshayak thabu ee aithihasika sankranthiye di bandaranayaka shrimathanan samanga wipakshayata pamini pirisa athare ethumage sewanalla se sitiye aatha dakune giruwapaththuwe beliaththa niyojanaya kala prathipaththi garuka edithara jana nayakayaku wu di.ee.rajapaksha mathithumaya.
